typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	pLote as string,
	pMesAnoRef as string
}
source(output(
		NOTA_FISCAL as string,
		DT_EMISSAO_NFST as timestamp,
		VL_ORIG_NFST as decimal(15,2),
		SERIE as string,
		CONTA_CLIENTE as string,
		CNPJ_CPF as string,
		NOME_CLIENTE as string,
		TERMINAL as string,
		VL_CONTEST_AJUSTE as decimal(15,2),
		VL_ALOCADO as decimal(15,2),
		DT_ALOCACAO as timestamp,
		HR_ALOCACAO as string,
		DT_AJUSTE as timestamp,
		HR_AJUSTE as string,
		OPERADORA as string,
		CD_OPERADORA as string,
		CD_MOTIVO_AJUSTE as string,
		DS_MOTIVO_AJUSTE as string,
		NUMERO_FATURA as string,
		FATU_ALOCADA as string,
		DT_EMISSAO_FATURA as timestamp,
		MESANOFATURA as string,
		VL_DOCTO_ORIGINAL as decimal(15,2),
		SALDO_DEVIDO_ORIG as decimal(15,2),
		SALDO_DEVEDOR as decimal(15,2),
		CONTA_CONTABIL as string,
		DS_CONTA_CONTABIL as string,
		VL_FATURA as decimal(15,2),
		CD_TIPO_RECEBIVEIS as string,
		DS_TIPO_RECEBIVEIS as string,
		DEBIT_ID as string,
		CREDIT_ID as string,
		DT_PAGAMENTO as timestamp,
		UF as string,
		VL_PGTO_ALOCADO as decimal(15,2),
		VL_TOTAL_PAGAMENTO as decimal(15,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ("SELECT K16.NOTA_FISCAL,K16.DT_EMISSAO_NFST ,K16.VL_ORIG_NFST,K16.SERIE,K16.CONTA_CLIENTE,K16.CNPJ_CPF,K16.NOME_CLIENTE,K16.TERMINAL,K16.VL_CONTEST_AJUSTE,K16.VL_ALOCADO,K16.DT_ALOCACAO,K16.HR_ALOCACAO,K16.DT_AJUSTE,K16.HR_AJUSTE,K16.OPERADORA,K16.CD_OPERADORA,K16.CD_MOTIVO_AJUSTE,K16.DS_MOTIVO_AJUSTE,K16.NUMERO_FATURA,K16.FATU_ALOCADA,K16.DT_EMISSAO_FATURA,K16.MESANOFATURA, K16.VL_DOCTO_ORIGINAL, K17.SALDO_DEVIDO_ORIG, K16.SALDO_DEVEDOR,K16.CONTA_CONTABIL,K16.DS_CONTA_CONTABIL,K16.VL_FATURA,K16.CD_TIPO_RECEBIVEIS,K16.DS_TIPO_RECEBIVEIS,K16.DEBIT_ID, K17.CREDIT_ID, K17.DT_PAGAMENTO,K16.UF, K17.VL_PGTO_ALOCADO, K17.VL_TOTAL_PAGAMENTO FROM [CONVENIO].[CVTB_VIVO_NEXT_K16] K16 , [CONVENIO].[CVTB_VIVO_NEXT_K17] K17 WHERE K16.CONTA_CLIENTE = K17.CONTA_CLIENTE AND K16.CNPJ_CPF = K17.CNPJ_CPF AND K16.FATU_ALOCADA = K17.FATU_ALOCADA AND K16.MESANOFATURA = K17.MESANOFATURA AND K16.DEBIT_ID = K17.DEBIT_ID AND K16.CREDIT_ID = K17.CREDIT_ID AND K16.ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO IN (SELECT ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO FROM CONVENIO.CVTB_LOTE_ARQUIVO WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ID_LOTE = {$pLote}) AND K17.ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO IN (SELECT ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO FROM CONVENIO.CVTB_LOTE_ARQUIVO WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE ID_LOTE = {$pLote})"),
	format: 'query') ~> TabelasVivoNext
TabelasVivoNext derive(id_lote_ajuste = $pLote,
		nome_billing = 'Vivonext',
		num_controle_reclamacao_normalizado = concat(trim(SERIE), '123'),
		cd_criado_por = 'Carga ADF - CargaArqVivoNext',
		dt_criado_em = add(currentTimestamp(), hours(-3)),
		fl_status_geral = 'NT',
		MES_ANO_REF_ARQ = $pMesAnoRef) ~> AdaptaColunas

		SEGMENTO_CLIENTE as string,

		SEGMENTO_VALOR as string,
		CLASSE_ELEGIBILIDADE as string,
		DESCR_SERV_AJUSTE as string,
		DESCR_SERV as string,
		CONTACONTABIL_DB as string,
		CONTACONTABIL_CR as string,
		DESCR_CONTACONTABIL_DB as string,
		DESCR_CONTACONTABIL_CR as string,
		SALDO_POS_AJUSTE as decimal(15,2),
		TIPO_OPERACAO as string,
		TIPO_TERMINAL as string,
		DONO_RECEITA as string,
		SUBTYPE_CODE as decimal(19,0),
		TIPO_DESCR_SERV as string,
		DT_VENCTO_FAT_FUTURA as timestamp,
		VLR_IMPOSTO_CONTESTADO as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_IMPOSTO_ICMS as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_BRUTO_ITEM as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_OUTROS_IMPOSTOS as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_AJUSTE_ITEM as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_CREDITO_AJUSTE as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_CREDITO_ITEM as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_DEVOLUCAO as decimal(15,2),

		NUM_ITEM_ESTORNADO as decimal(10,0),
		FLG_RETIFICADO as string,
		TERMINAL_115 as string,
		VALOR_ITEM_115 as decimal(15,2),
		DT_CRIADO_EM as timestamp,

		MES_ANO_FAT_ORIGINAL as string,
		MES_ANO_FAT_AJUSTE as string,
		VLR_PAGAMENTO_FAT_ORIGINAL as decimal(15,2),

		NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG_NORMALIZADO as string,

		DEBIT_ID as string,
		DT_EMISSAO_FATURA_ORIGINAL as timestamp,
		UF_NF as string,
		VLR_PGTO_ALOCADO as decimal(15,2),
		VLR_TOTAL_PGTO as decimal(15,2),

		DT_IMPORTACAO as timestamp,

		ID_MESTRE_CONVENIO_115 as decimal(28,0),

		DT_EMISSAO_115 as timestamp,

	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,

		DESCR_RCBL_FATURA = DS_TIPO_RECEBIVEIS,
		DT_PAGAMENTO,
		DEBIT_ID,
		DT_EMISSAO_FATURA_ORIGINAL = DT_EMISSAO_FATURA,
		UF_NF = UF,
		VLR_PGTO_ALOCADO = VL_PGTO_ALOCADO,
		VLR_TOTAL_PGTO = VL_TOTAL_PAGAMENTO,
		CREDIT_ID,
		MES_ANO_REF_ARQ,
		ID_LOTE_AJUSTE = id_lote_ajuste
	)) ~> TabelaCONTESTACAO

parameters{
	pNomeArquivo as string
}
source(output(
		value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	moveFiles: ['atis/validados_a_processar','atis/processados']) ~> srcArqAtisNaoPago
source(output(
		ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO as decimal(38,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ("SELECT ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO FROM CONVENIO.CVTB_LOTE_ARQUIVO WHERE NM_ARQUIVO = '{$pNomeArquivo}'"),
	format: 'query') ~> BuscaLoteArqAtual
BuscaLoteArqAtual derive(SyntheticKey = 1) ~> FakeKey2
srcArqAtisNaoPago derive(SyntheticKey = 1,
		CONTA_COBRANCA = trim(substring(value, 1, 11)),
		CPF_CNPJ = trim(substring(value, 13, 14)),
		CATEGORIA_CLIENTE = trim(substring(value, 27, 2)),
		UF_COBRANCA = trim(substring(value, 29, 2)),
		ID_FATURA = trim(substring(value, 31, 25)),
		DATA_GERACAO = toTimestamp(trim(substring(value, 56, 8)), 'yyyyMMdd'),
		DATA_VENCTO_ORIGINAL = toTimestamp(trim(substring(value, 64, 8)), 'yyyyMMdd'),
		DATA_VENCTO_BOLETO_ULT = toTimestamp(trim(substring(value, 72, 8)), 'yyyyMMdd'),
		VALOR_FATURA_ORIGINAL = (toDecimal(trim(substring(value, 80, 17))))/100,
		COD_FAC_CD = toDecimal(trim(substring(value, 97, 9))),
		VALOR_CONTESTACAO = (toDecimal(trim(substring(value, 106, 17))))/100,
		DATA_OPERACAO = toTimestamp(trim(substring(value, 123, 8)), 'yyyyMMdd'),
		OPERADORA = trim(substring(value, 131, 20)),
		CODIGO_OPERADORA = trim(substring(value, 151, 3)),
		MOTIVO_OPERACAO = trim(substring(value, 154, 15)),
		RECEITA_OPERADORA = trim(substring(value, 169, 3)),
		CONTACONTABIL = trim(substring(value, 172, 11)),
		DESCRCONTACONTABIL = trim(substring(value, 183, 40)),
		VALOR_POS_CONTESTACAO = (toDecimal(trim(substring(value, 223, 17))))/100,
		VALOR_SALDO_ABERTO = (toDecimal(trim(substring(value, 240, 17))))/100,
		FAMILIA_PRODUTOS = trim(substring(value, 257, 14)),
		MOTIVO_CONTESTACAO = trim(substring(value, 271, 2)),
		NUMERO_NOTA_FISCAL = trim(substring(value, 273, 13)),
		SERIE_NOTA_FISCAL = trim(substring(value, 286, 2)),
		DATA_EMISSAO = toTimestamp(trim(substring(value, 288, 8)), 'yyyyMMdd'),
		VALOR_TOTAL = (toDecimal(trim(substring(value, 296, 17))))/100,
		TIPO_OPERACAO = trim(substring(value, 313, 30)),
		DATA_FECHAMENTO = toTimestamp(trim(substring(value, 343, 8)), 'yyyyMMdd'),
		DATA_CONTA = toTimestamp(trim(substring(value,351, 8)), 'yyyyMMdd')) ~> FakeKey1
FakeKey1, FakeKey2 join(FakeKey1@SyntheticKey == FakeKey2@SyntheticKey,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join
Join sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ID_ATIS_NAO_PAGO as decimal(28,0),
		ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO as decimal(28,0),
		COD_IDENT_CLI as string,
		CPF_CNPJ as string,
		TIPO_DOCUMENTO as string,
		UF_FATURA as string,
		NUM_FATURA_ORIGINAL as string,
		DT_ABERTURA_IMPUG as timestamp,
		DT_VENC_FATURA_ORIGINAL as timestamp,
		VLR_FATURA as decimal(15,2),
		COD_FAC_CD as decimal(10,0),
		VLR_CONTESTADO as decimal(15,2),
		DT_AJUSTE as timestamp,
		DESCR_OPERADORA as string,
		COD_OPERADORA as string,
		CONTACONTABIL as string,
		DESCRCONTACONTABIL as string,
		SALDO_POS_AJUSTE as decimal(15,2),
		SALDO_DEVEDOR as decimal(15,2),
		COD_MOTIVO_AJUSTE as string,
		NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG as string,
		SERIE_NF as string,
		DT_EMISSAO_FATURA as timestamp,
		VLR_ORIG_NSFT as decimal(15,2),
		TIPO_OPERACAO as string,
		FAMILIA_PRODUTOS as string,
		DT_FECHAMENTO as timestamp,
		DT_CONTA as timestamp,
		RECEITA_OPERADORA as string,
		DT_VENCTO_BOLETO_ULT as timestamp,
		MOTIVO_OPERACAO as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO,
		COD_IDENT_CLI = CONTA_COBRANCA,
		CPF_CNPJ,
		TIPO_DOCUMENTO = CATEGORIA_CLIENTE,
		UF_FATURA = UF_COBRANCA,
		NUM_FATURA_ORIGINAL = ID_FATURA,
		DT_ABERTURA_IMPUG = DATA_GERACAO,
		DT_VENC_FATURA_ORIGINAL = DATA_VENCTO_ORIGINAL,
		VLR_FATURA = VALOR_FATURA_ORIGINAL,
		COD_FAC_CD,
		VLR_CONTESTADO = VALOR_CONTESTACAO,
		DT_AJUSTE = DATA_OPERACAO,
		DESCR_OPERADORA = OPERADORA,
		COD_OPERADORA = CODIGO_OPERADORA,
		CONTACONTABIL,
		DESCRCONTACONTABIL,
		SALDO_POS_AJUSTE = VALOR_POS_CONTESTACAO,
		SALDO_DEVEDOR = VALOR_SALDO_ABERTO,
		COD_MOTIVO_AJUSTE = MOTIVO_CONTESTACAO,
		NOTA_FISCAL_ORIG = NUMERO_NOTA_FISCAL,
		SERIE_NF = SERIE_NOTA_FISCAL,
		DT_EMISSAO_FATURA = DATA_EMISSAO,
		VLR_ORIG_NSFT = VALOR_TOTAL,
		TIPO_OPERACAO,
		FAMILIA_PRODUTOS,
		DT_FECHAMENTO = DATA_FECHAMENTO,
		DT_CONTA = DATA_CONTA,
		RECEITA_OPERADORA,
		DT_VENCTO_BOLETO_ULT = DATA_VENCTO_BOLETO_ULT,
		MOTIVO_OPERACAO
	)) ~> GravaTabAtisNaoPago
